title: A true report of the great costs and charges of the foure hospitals in the City of London in the maintenance of their great number of poore this present yeare, 1645, as followeth.
notes: In fact a report on the five following hospitals: Christ's hospital, St. Bartholomew's, St. Thomas's, Bridewell, and Bethlem.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill 8th 1645./"; "Munday in Easter week at the Spitle, but noe psalmes as in other yeares, nor sermon on Good Friday."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
